## Technical Description
This Shiny for Python app demonstrates multiple ways to use `ui.panel_title()` with various parameters and scenarios:

1. Basic String Title
2. HTML Title with Custom Styling
3. Title with Different Window Title
4. Dynamic Interactive Title
5. Title with Icon
6. Real-time Updating Title

## Installation and Execution
To run this app, ensure you have the following dependencies:
- shiny
- pandas
- matplotlib (optional, for potential future visualizations)

Install dependencies:
```bash
pip install shiny pandas
```

Run the app:
```bash
shiny run app.py
```

## Package Dependencies
- shiny
- pandas
- datetime
- random

### Key Shiny for Python Techniques Demonstrated
- `ui.panel_title()` with different input types
- Reactive UI rendering
- Dynamic title generation
- Data filtering and aggregation
- Font Awesome icon integration

The app showcases the flexibility of `ui.panel_title()` by using various input types like strings, HTML tags, and dynamic content generation. It also includes interactive elements that allow users to explore different title styles and see how they can be dynamically modified.
